completed_steps.summary: Classified as monorepo with 2 parts: game (backend/Rust/SpacetimeDB) and global_module (backend/Rust/SpacetimeDB, symlinks shared code)
Scanned existing docs - only PR template found
Tech stack: Rust 2021, SpacetimeDB 1.6.0, glam 0.30.9, strum 0.24, csv, regex. Build: custom build.rs with codegen
Exhaustive scan: ~80 entity tables, 148 static data tables, 20 agents, 20 knowledge categories, hex coordinate system, inter-module messaging
Source tree documented with annotated directory structure
Dev/deployment guides written - CI/CD via GitHub Actions, multi-environment deployment
Integration architecture documented - inter-module messaging via InterModuleMessageV4 with typed MessageContentsV4 enum
Architecture doc written - 20 sections covering full system
All supporting docs written: project-overview.md, development-guide.md, source-tree-analysis.md, data-models.md
Master index generated with links to all docs
Validation passed - all 6 doc files exist, no incomplete markers found

findings.game_module: 533 .rs files, ~80 entity tables, 148 static data tables, 20 agents, 16+ handler domains
findings.global_module: 150+ .rs files, auth/empires/social/moderation, 2 agents, symlinks shared code
findings.build_system: Custom build.rs generating handlers, entities, static data, discovery, inter-module code

resume_instructions: Workflow complete. All documentation generated successfully.
